text: The 2015 Portland Timbers 2 season is the inaugural season for the Portland Timbers 2 in United Soccer League (USL), the third-division professional soccer league in the United States and Canada. The Timbers 2 are the reserve team of the MLS side, Portland Timbers. == Background == == Competitions == === United Soccer League === ==== Preseason ==== ==== USL Regular Season ==== ==== USL Playoffs ==== ==== Standings ==== === U.S. Open Cup === === Cascadia 2 Cup === === Friendlies === ==Club== ===Kits=== {| | | | | | | | | | | |} {| class="wikitable" |- !
